title: Reconnecting to a game i haven't joined
body: Fix your problem with not being able to even start a game, its making me reconnect to a game and it just makes my computer sit on a black screen because i have no game to reconnect to wtf did you guys do to make that mistake.

replies.body: These ghost games happen when something goes wrong at the end of the match where the game never properly tells your client that it's finished. Most of the time they clear up after enough time, have you been able to get back in any games yet?
Yeah once i switch accounts to my smurf and played a game or two it reset the client and let me play i guess.
